name: "Queer as Folk" Season 4 Quiz | 'Queer As Folk' - Seasons & Episodes | 10 Questions

questions.text: At the beginning of this season did Brian have a job?
questions.explanation:
No.

	Brian was fired from the advertising firm that he worked for because he helped to discredit Stockwell.

questions.text: Who was Ted's counselor while he was at rehab?
questions.explanation:
Blake.

	If you will remember Ted had a relationship with Blake.  He tried to take care of him when he was an addict and then lost touch with him.  He made his recovery and became a drug counselor and helped Ted with his recovery.

questions.text: Who did Emmett live with at the beginning of this season?
questions.explanation:
Melanie and Lindsay.

	He lived with Melanie and Lindsay after he and Ted broke up.  He moved in with Debbie after Vic moved in with Rodney.

questions.text: A film director from California was very interested in turning Michael and Justin's comic book "Rage" into a major motion picture.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Michael and Justin never really got along, however they did create a comic book called "Rage" together.  It is about a superhero that helps fight for gay rights.  Justin does the artwork and Michael does the story lines for the comic book.  Michael received an e-mail from a popular director interested into turning "Rage" into a film.

questions.text: What was the name of the biking event that was organized to help the AIDS hospice center in Pittsburgh?
questions.explanation:
Liberty Ride.

	Ted and Melanie were main organizers of this event to help raise money for the AIDS hospice house on Liberty Avenue.

questions.text: Which one of the following characters died during the fourth season?
questions.explanation:
Vic.

	Michael's Uncle Vic died at his home in his chair.  He was HIV positive, but he did not die from that.  He was living with his partner Rodney when he died.  Vic and Debbie had a huge falling out right before he died and that was the last time that Debbie saw him alive.

questions.text: Which holiday did Debbie celebrate at her house during this season?
questions.explanation:
Christmas.

	Debbie found a note that Vic wrote when he was sick from long before that conveyed his wishes of how he would like people to honor him following his death.  He wanted a big party to honor his life.  She decided to have a Christmas party because that was his favorite time of year.

questions.text: Which person was diagnosed with cancer?
questions.explanation:
Brian.

	Brian had a liaison with a doctor who found a lump in his left testicle.  He went to a doctor and was diagnosed with testicular cancer.  He had his testicle removed and replaced with a prosthetic testicle.

questions.text: Which of the following couples said "I do"?
questions.explanation:
Ben and Michael.

	Ben asked Michael to marry him on the bus ride to Canada for the Liberty Ride.  They were married in Canada.  They did have trouble crossing back into the United States because they tried to do so as a married couple which was not recognized at the time.

questions.text: Melanie gave birth to a little girl.  What did she name her?
questions.explanation:
Jenny Rebecca.

	Little Jenny Rebecca was welcomed to the world after fourteen hours of labor.  Michael found out that she was born after he crossed the finish line of the Liberty Ride.
